MS MCQs

    Introduction to Dataverse for developers

    »

    1. Which of the following is not a first party application that Microsoft has built on Microsoft Dataverse?

      Dynamics 365 for Sales

      Dynamics 365 for Talent

      SharePoint


    2. What do we call .NET assemblies that automate business logic via server-side execution?

      Functions

      Plug-ins

      PowerApp Modules


    3. When is it appropriate to handle the PreValidation event?

      To run custom validation logic and cancel the operation before the transaction occurs.

      To run custom validation logic and cancel the operation after the transaction occurs.

      To update entity values before a save operation occurs.
